title: Night flight
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Malcolm Patterson
brief_description: A rare insight into the life of the sugar glider, one of Australia’s unique nocturnal marsupials. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
